title: Bright, clean, newly remodeled and ready for you! Tour today!
posting_body: ['2 Bedroom  2 Bathroom | 1043 sq ft | $1500/Month', 'Brooks Crossing Apartments', '8050 Taylor Road', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'Brooks Crossing Apartments boasts amenities that make living here both comfortable and convenient.', 'Work out in our new fitness center, relax by the pool or enjoy the use of the multi-purpose sports court.', 'We offer numerous tot lots for younger residents, and a spacious sunning deck perfect for grilling or picnicking.', 'You can also enjoy a leisurely walk around the community as it is nestled among canopies of trees and other natural surroundings or update your social media status in our business center.', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Cable Ready', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Deck', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Fireplace', '● Freezer', '● Heating', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Range', '● Refrigerator', '● Tub/Shower', '● Vaulted Ceilings', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Washer/Dryer Hookup', '● Wi-Fi', '● Window Coverings', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Courtyard', '● Fitness Center', '● Maintenance on site', '● Picnic Areas', '● Playground', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Smoke Free', '● Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '● Covered Parking', '● Fax/Copy Services', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Monthly Resident Events', '● Multi Use Room', '● Online Services', '● Package Service', '● Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '● Resident Referral Bonuses', '● Tennis Court', 'Additional Details:', 'Deposit: Call', 'Terms: 6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pets: A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'D6C0C42A524340']
